name: UILocalizedIndexedCollation
desc: An object that organizes, sorts, and localizes the data for a table view that has a section index.

items.name: class func current() -> Self
items.desc: Returns an indexed-collation instance for the current table view.

items.name: func section(for: Any, collationStringSelector: Selector) -> Int
items.desc: Returns an integer identifying the section in which a model object belongs.

items.name: func sortedArray(from: [Any], collationStringSelector: Selector) -> [Any]
items.desc: Sorts the objects within a section by their localized titles.

items.name: var sectionTitles: [String]
items.desc: Returns the list of section titles for the table view.

items.name: var sectionIndexTitles: [String]
items.desc: Returns the list of section-index titles for the table view

items.name: func section(forSectionIndexTitle: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the section that the table view should scroll to for the given index title.
